desc: A blue flower that glows softly under the right conditions.

dictionary.lore: These freshly-picked blooms are prized by the Greherd for their hallucinogenic properties, especially during their first glow. Grown in their greenhouses together with other poisonous plants, they are often dried and added to battle stimulants to enhance their effects. They tend to cause dehydration, irregular bowel movements, and severe muscle spasms if improperly used.

name: Sarayagaza Bloom
